function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of VAR approach without considering contagious diseases impact","Impact":"Risk of neglecting the potential impact of contagious diseases on macro and idiosyncratic variables, leading to incomplete analysis","Mitigation":"Incorporate contagious diseases data and their potential impact on macro and idiosyncratic variables into the analysis","Technologies":"Epidemiological data and modeling tools","People":"Research analysts, policymakers, stakeholders in financial sector","Owner":"Research analysts, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Unanticipated exogenous shock in the model","Impact":"Potential for inaccurate analysis and conclusions due to unforeseen external factors impacting the model","Mitigation":"Regularly update the model with real-time data and consider scenarios of exogenous shocks","Technologies":"Real-time data integration, scenario analysis tools","People":"Research analysts, economists, policymakers","Owner":"Research analysts, government economic agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of macroeconomic variables on NPL/L without considering health-related factors","Impact":"Neglecting the potential influence of health-related factors on NPL/L, leading to incomplete analysis and risk assessment","Mitigation":"Incorporate health-related data and potential disease outbreaks into the analysis of NPL/L","Technologies":"Health data integration, disease outbreak modeling tools","People":"Risk analysts, financial regulators, public health officials","Owner":"Risk analysts, government health agencies"}]}
